author: Kan Ting Chiu J:
casename: Re Section 22 of the Mutual Assistance in Criminal Matters Act

tags-parsed: Criminal Procedure and Sentencing/Mutual legal assistance/Whether application for bank to produce material relating to account of client should be granted/Whether request must be exhibited with application/Whether proper request by prescribed foreign country an essential part of application/Section 22 Mutual Assistance in Criminal Matters Act (Cap 190A, 2001 Rev Ed)
